list.title: 概要统计信息
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","title":"empty object","properties":{"cumulativeUsers":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"累计用户"},"activePassMonth":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"过去30天活跃用户"},"activePassWeek":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"过去7天活跃用户"},"newUsersToday":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"今日新增用户"},"newUsersTodayRate":{"type":"integer","description":"今日新增用户涨跌率，单位百分数，正数为涨，负数为跌"},"loginTimesToday":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"今日登录次数"},"loginTimesTodayRate":{"type":"integer","description":"今日登录次数涨跌率，单位百分数，正数为涨，负数为跌"},"activeUsersToday":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"今日活跃用户"},"activeUsersTodayRate":{"type":"integer","description":"今日活跃用户涨跌率，单位百分数，正数为涨，负数为跌"}},"required":["cumulativeUsers","activePassMonth","activePassMonth","activePassWeek","newUsersToday","loginTimesToday","activeUsersToday","activeUsersToday","newUsersTodayRate","loginTimesTodayRate","activeUsersTodayRate"]}

object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":9000001,"maximum":9010000,"description":"用户ID"},"nickname":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"昵称","mock":{"mock":"@cname"}},"gender":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"性别","enum":["男","女","未知"]},"age":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":20,"maximum":80,"description":"年龄"},"income":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":0,"maximum":500,"description":"收入"},"userStatus":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"用户状态，1为正常，2为冻结","enum":["1","2"]},"created":{"type":"integer","description":"注册时间","enum":[1598608534811]},"city":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"注册地区","mock":{"mock":"@city"}},"avatar":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"头像","enum":["https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-01.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-02.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-03.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-04.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-05.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-06.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-07.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-08.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-09.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-10.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-11.png","https://yjy-oss-files.oss-cn-zhangjiakou.aliyuncs.com/tanhua/header-12.png"]},"tags":{"type":"string","description":"用户标签","enum":["音乐,上班族,麦霸,网瘾少年,手办"]},"marriage":{"type":"string","description":"0：未婚，1：已婚
